extended: Which of the following accommodations will be available?
hybrid_automatedCaptions: Automated captions, online access to hybrid services
hybrid_liveCaptions: Live captions, online access to hybrid services
inPerson_adaAll: ADA-compliant location for all in-person services
inPerson_adaSome: ADA-compliant location for some in-person services
note: If participants must request accommodations in advance, please add that detail in the 'Other' field.
